channel.title: NMS:VFS on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NMS:VFS on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: VinFast Plans US Plant in 2028 as It Seeks Equity Backers
item.description: VinFast Auto Ltd. expects to open its delayed North Carolina plant in 2028 while the Vietnamese electric vehicle maker continues to seek equity investors, according to Chairwoman Le Thi Thu Thuy.
